Body:
density = np.ones(100)
density[4] = 0.0
density[96] = 0.0
z_grid = np.linspace(0, 1, 100)
delta = 0.1
target_density = density.copy()
target_density[:4] = 0.0
target_density[96:] = 0.0
normalize(target_density)
remove_bumps(density, delta)
np.testing.assert_array_equal(density, target_density)
